name: Ciudad Alfombra
description:
Description:
In this game, you are a mini car that navigates through a city, collecting coins, unlocking cars, and completing missions.

Controls:
You need to click on all the obstacles on the road to deactivate or interact with them. To avoid pedestrians, you should tap the "Beep Beep" horn button located in the bottom left corner.

Content:
There is a shop where you can purchase upgrades such as turbos and different types of cars, like MiniVans and large buses. There are primary and secondary missions available, which, upon completion, will reward you with more coins.
